import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { DinamicInput } from 'src/app/utils/DinamicInput'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nuevo-usuario', templateUrl: './nuevo-usuario.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nuevo-usuario.component.css'] }) export class NuevoUsuarioComponent extends DinamicInput{ formNewUser!: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { super(); } ngOnInit() { this.formNewUser = this.fb.group({ documentNumber: new FormControl(''), namesUser: new FormControl(''), lastNamesUser: new FormControl(''), nameBoss: new FormControl(''), phoneNumber: new FormControl(''), email: new FormControl(''), password: new FormControl(''), repeatPassword: new FormControl(''), }) } }
